entry.title: Ooowee
entry.content:
But I guess things went downhill from there, started isolating myself from her. Used to tell her everything I was felling, but then I guess I stopped, ‘cause I wanted her to love who she thought I　was, not who I felt myself becoming. Ever think about how horrified the people we love would be, if they found out who we truly are?

So we just dig ourselves deeper into our lies every day, ultimately hurting the only people brave enough to love us. Wish I didn’t do that. Wish I was brave enough to love them back. I didn’t know, maybe you should try it. We don’t have as much time as we think. Ooowee.
entry.summary: But I guess things went downhill from there, started isolating myself from her. Used to tell her everything I was felling, but then I gue

entry.title: 大三秋季第一天
entry.content:
1.操作系统老佛爷真牛逼

“作为大三的计算机同学，ubuntu都装不来，可以从学院11楼跳下去了”

“以前我不能说，现在男生穿的像小鲜肉一样就滚出我的课堂”

“要是你们觉得linux不好用，那是因为你们不配”

2.被骗了 计算机图形学怎么要考试

entry.title: 21学年秋季学期首日教育
entry.content: 在上海大学领导的英明带领下，我们听了一整个早上的体育学院老师如何锻炼身体，以及进行了一手体型歧视，真好啊！还有一个CCF七篇一作的学长来尝试教会我如何不被顶会拒稿，我再次意识到自己是废物。真好啊！
entry.summary: 在上海大学领导的英明带领下，我们听了一整个早上的体育学院老师如何锻炼身体，以及进行了一手体型歧视，真好啊！还有一个CCF七篇一作的学长来尝试教会我如何不被顶会拒稿，我再次意识到自己是废物。真好啊！

category.term: 怎么有学校首日教育讲体育啊
